      • config

        public java.lang.String config(java.lang.String name)
        Retrieve a configuration value from the project. If the configuration key is not found, create an empty one.
        Parameters:
        name - The configuration key
        Returns:
        The configuration value

      • config

        public java.lang.String config(java.lang.String name,
                      java.lang.String value)
        Create a new configuration key,value pair in the project. If the configuration key already exists, only update its value.
        Parameters:
        name - The configuration key
        value - The configuration value
        Returns:
        The new value for this configuration key
